headline: Why Steel Dynamics (STLD) Is Up 7.2% After Upbeat Q3 Outlook and Aluminum Mill Progress
summary: Steel Dynamics recently provided third-quarter 2025 earnings guidance, projecting US$2.60 to US$2.64 per diluted share and highlighting improved profitability across its steel, metals recycling, and steel fabrication operations compared to both the previous quarter and prior year period. An important development is the continued successful commissioning of its new aluminum flat rolled products mill in Mississippi and a recycled slab facility in San Luis Potosi, marking a significant step in...
